title: Strengthening Medical Practical Skills: Integrated Transgender Primary Care Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: They can explain three or more physical and mental health needs of transgender and non-binary patients and integrate them into existing medical protocols.
They can connect transgender health knowledge with two or more existing medical courses (e.g., endocrinology, mental health).
Learners can apply acquired transgender health knowledge to real clinical scenarios through simulations or case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
